name: VanBus
keywords: van-bus, van-bus-packets, car, arduino, automotive, protocol, psa, peugeot, citroen, esp32, esp8266, network, sniffer, receiver, can, can-bus, m2m, iot
description: Vehicle Area Network (VAN) bus packet reader, for reading from a VAN bus as used by PSA (Peugeot, Citroen) for various models up to 2009. It supports all espressif compatible hardware, like ESP32, ESP8266, ESP8285 etc.
